p: Patients with COVID-19 can provide novel types of data that are relevant to achieving medical goals. Self-tracking devices, mobile health apps, and social media can provide patients with information about COVID-19 and can enable them to monitor their health or even achieve a certain goal. Incorporating AI into devices offers tools and methods for designing and analyzing therapies that can be made accessible to patients and clinicians while supporting consistent integration into patients’ lives and clinicians’ practices [ 17, 46, 47]. This field not only offers promising challenges for patients with COVID-19 but can also improve systematic data collection to determine treatment effectiveness.
